events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision that occurred at an intersection on April 30th, resulting in damage to the front bumper and left headlight.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after confirming the keywords 'vehicle' and 'collision' in the initial report.
An insurance agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to manage the case and contact the insured for next steps.
Acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and assuring timely processing of their vehicle accident claim.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair shop estimate to proceed with the investigation.
The insured promptly submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the vehicle damage and official accident report.
Investigation commenced with a claims adjuster assigned to assess the extent of the vehicle damage and verify details of the accident.
The investigation was completed successfully with confirmation that the accident was covered under the insuredâ€™s policy terms.
A settlement proposal was sent to the insured detailing the approved repair costs to be covered by the policy for vehicle damage.
The customer responded with appreciation for the clear communication and expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount.
The claim was officially approved by the insurer after internal review and confirmation of policy coverage for the auto accident damages.
Payment for the repair of the vehicle was issued promptly to the repair vendor in accordance with the settlement agreement.
The claim was closed successfully after payment was processed and the insured confirmed that vehicle repairs were completed.
